title: That Girl in Yellow Boots
short_cast: Kalki Koechlin, Prashant Prakash, Gulshan Devaiah, Naseeruddin Shah, Pooja Swaroop, Kumud Mishra, Shivkumar Subramaniam, Divya Jagdale, Thani, Kartik Krishnan
cast: Kalki Koechlin, Prashant Prakash, Gulshan Devaiah, Naseeruddin Shah, Pooja Swaroop, Kumud Mishra, Shivkumar Subramaniam, Divya Jagdale, Thani, Kartik Krishnan
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Independent Movies
desc: A British woman who travels to India in search of her father is compelled to take on work in a seedy massage parlor to fund her stay.
